title: Microsoft Teams: In-context Stores
description:
The
in-context stores are found in menus throughout the Teams experience that let
users discover and install apps that support the specific context the user is
in. For example, when a user opens the Message extension (ME) in-context store
they are shown a selection of apps that have the ME capability. Discovering
apps in the in-context Store keeps users in their flows and reduces the
confusion regarding the apps capability users face today when installing apps
from the Store.
